Package icyllis.arc3d.vulkan

package icyllis.arc3d.vulkan
Vulkan.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    VkBackendContext
    The VkBackendContext contains all the base Vulkan objects needed by the VulkanDevice.
    VkBackendFormat
     
    VkBackendRenderTarget
     
    VKCore
    Provides native interfaces of Vulkan 1.1 core and user-defined utilities.
    VulkanAllocation
    Holds Vulkan memory allocation information.
    VulkanBackendImage
    When importing external memory, VulkanBackendImage.mMemoryHandle is POSIX file descriptor or Win32 NT handle (though HANDLE is defined as void*, we can safely truncate it because Win32 handles are 32-bit significant).
    VulkanBuffer
     
    VulkanCaps
     
    VulkanCommandBuffer
     
    VulkanCommandPool
    VkCommandPool is created with a single primary command buffer and (optional) a set of secondary command buffers.
    VulkanDevice
     
    VulkanImage
    Represents Vulkan images, can be used as textures or attachments.
    VulkanImageDesc
    When wrapping a BackendImage or BackendRenderTarget, the VulkanImageDesc.mCurrentQueueFamily should either be VK10.VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_IGNORED, VK10.VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_EXTERNAL, or EXTQueueFamilyForeign.VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_FOREIGN_EXT.
    VulkanImageMutableState
     
    VulkanImageView
     
    VulkanMemoryAllocator
    AMD vulkan memory.
    VulkanPrimaryCommandBuffer
     
    VulkanRenderPassFramebuffer
     
    VulkanRenderTarget
